page_intro: Where Empathy Bridges Emotion and Reason through Jung’s Symbolic Mind and Ekman’s Science of Expression.

articles.title: The Bridge of Empathy
articles.subtitle: Connecting emotion and reason across the human psyche.
articles.main_paragraph_bold: Empathy unites feeling and understanding through emotional resonance.
articles.paragraph_1: This article explores empathy as both a psychological and biological capacity that allows humans to sense the emotions of others.
articles.paragraph_2: It reflects on how empathy forms the meeting point between Jung’s symbolic understanding of the psyche and Ekman’s measurable science of emotion.

articles.title: The Science of Compassion
articles.subtitle: Understanding the biological roots of empathy and care.
articles.main_paragraph_bold: Compassion is the science of connection and the heart of human morality.
articles.paragraph_1: This article explores how facial expression, tone and physiology reflect empathic processes, linking neuroscience and psychology.
articles.paragraph_2: It highlights how awareness of emotion deepens compassion and supports healthy human relationships.

articles.title: Intuition and Emotion in Understanding Others
articles.subtitle: Exploring the balance between intuition and analysis in empathy.
articles.main_paragraph_bold: Empathy lives where intuition meets insight.
articles.paragraph_1: This article explores how intuition interprets emotion beyond logic, forming a natural bridge between feeling and perception.
articles.paragraph_2: It shows how Jung’s idea of symbolic intuition aligns with Ekman’s study of microexpressions as complementary paths to emotional understanding.
